item.title: The Right to Your Feed
item.description: The Right to Your Feed I don’t need to bore you with stats, but here’s one that’s hard to ignore: since 2011, the share of teen girls reporting persistent sadness has jumped from 36% to 57%, while suicide rates for kids aged 10 - 14 have tripled. If you have a pulse, you’re on social media, and you’ve probably experienced a version of this—the quiet drag of feeds, reels, images, all vying for attention.
